vulnerabilities.justification: The vulnerability is mitigated by upgrading Go stdlib to version 1.23.8 or later.
vulnerabilities.details: The application currently uses Go stdlib version 1.23.7 which is vulnerable. Upgrade to 1.23.8 or 1.24.2 has been applied/planned to mitigate the risk.

vulnerabilities.justification: Application uses react-router 7.5.2 which is not vulnerable.
vulnerabilities.details: Vulnerability affected react-router version 7.4.1, which has been upgraded to 7.5.2.
